item.title: Cartel operatives went on a rampage after the killing of their leader, Nemesio "El Mencho" Oseguera,...
item.description:
ğŸ¦ @CNN

Cartel operatives went on a rampage after the killing of their leader, Nemesio "El Mencho" Oseguera, in Puerto Vallarta, setting fire to cars and buses and attacking stores. From his apartment balcony, Berl Schwartz, originally from Michigan, could hear blaring alarms and the boom of explosions. Billowing, acrid-smelling black clouds drifted over the turquoise waters of Banderas Bay. https://cnn.it/3OIFUMF
